pageSubtitle: Book your table at our restaurant now!

online.title: Online
online.subtitle: Booking, It's easy as an apple pie
online.text:
When you finalize a reservation with OpenTable they will send you a confirmation email immediately. We will also call you on the date of your reservation to confirm your table.

If you do not receive an email, or do not hear from the restaurant, we would recommend calling to confirm your table and verify your reservation booking (+1 939 777 55 33).
